mapper.insert: INSERT INTO `tb_disable_date_userinfo_metadata` (name, disabilityCardNumber, disabilityType, disabilityLevel, age, sex, address, householdNature, r3, r4, cellPhone, r6, r7, r741, r8, r9, r10, r11, r12, r13, r14, r15, r16, r17, r18, r19, r193, r20, r21, r22, r23, r24, r25, r26, r27, householder, headOfHouseholdIdNumber, declarer, informationCollector, dateOfFillingOutTheForm, districtAddress, street) value (#{name}, #{disabilityCardNumber}, #{disabilityType}, #{disabilityLevel}, #{age}, #{sex}, #{address}, #{householdNature}, #{r3}, #{r4}, #{cellPhone}, #{r6}, #{r7}, #{r741}, #{r8}, #{r9}, #{r10}, #{r11}, #{r12}, #{r13}, #{r14}, #{r15}, #{r16}, #{r17}, #{r18}, #{r19}, #{r193}, #{r20}, #{r21}, #{r22}, #{r23}, #{r24}, #{r25}, #{r26}, #{r27}, #{householder}, #{headOfHouseholdIdNumber}, #{declarer}, #{informationCollector}, #{dateOfFillingOutTheForm}, #{districtAddress}, #{street})
